title: Shygirl Announces Club Shy Room 2 EP, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
description: French singer Yseult joins Shygirl for the new track “F*Me”
author: Walden Green
excerpt: French singer Yseult joins Shygirl for the new track “F*Me”
text: French singer Yseult joins Shygirl for the new track “F*Me”Shygirl has announced a new EP: Club Shy Room 2 is out February 14 via Because Music, and it will include the recent Saweetie collaboration “Immaculate.” The six-track release will also feature “F*Me,” a new song featuring French singer Yseult that’s co-produced by Mura Masa and Shygirl. html:
French singer Yseult joins Shygirl for the new track “F*Me”

Shygirl has announced a new EP: Club Shy Room 2 is out February 14 via Because Music, and it will include the recent Saweetie collaboration “Immaculate.” The six-track release will also feature “F*Me,” a new song featuring French singer Yseult that’s co-produced by Mura Masa and Shygirl. Find the new track’s video below.

This year, Shygirl released the Club Shy EP and the companion Club Shy (Rmx) EP. She also joined Charli XCX and Troye Sivan on the Sweat Tour.

Shygirl released her debut studio album, Nymph, in September 2022. Read more about it in “The Best Progressive Pop Music of 2022.”
